lead_paragraph: MANHEIMER--Ellen (Buckner), 70, originally from Great Neck, NY and then Port Washington, NY, passed away suddenly on January 26, 2016 in Oceanside, California. She leaves behind her son Bradford Buckner Fields and daughter-in-law Kimberly; two grandsons, Jackson and Beau; her mother, Claudia Buckner; her two sisters Karen Etra and Robin Buckner; and her longtime devoted companion and partner Sheldon (Shelly) Marks. Services will be on Sunday, January 31 at 10am at Gutterman's Woodbury on Jericho Turnpike. 1/3
